quote: You can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets. – Arnold Schwarzenegger
fact: Arnold Schonberg suffered from triskaidecaphobia, the fear of the number 13.  He died at 13 minutes from midnight on Friday the 13th.
joke: Why did the house go to the doctor? It was having window panes.
